attributes.action: Allow all ex serving Gurkhas to live in the UK if they so wish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an absolute disgrace that many of the brave Gurkhas who have served this country well should be told that they are not allowed to settle in the UK once they retire from the services. The government should change the rules immediately to allow these wonderful people to stay here if they so wish. We should be proud to have them in our communities.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
